name: My Revenge is Inevitable
description:
LD50 entry.  Theme: Delay the Inevitable.

  • Click above you to jump
  • Click below you to run along the ground 
  • Press R to quick restart a level
  • Press M to return to the Menu
  • Take Revenge!!!

You're a ninja and the local magistrate destroyed your village.  Take revenge.  The magistrate will use tricks and traps in an attempt to DELAY THE INEVITABLE.  You will win.  Mostly because you have unlimited lives. 

It is a Time Attack, so try to get the fastest time in each level.  Your total is displayed on the menu when all the levels are clear.

There are instructions in game, but there are some points worth emphasizing. 

You can run through spikes!  Just stay on the ground.

Click on the ground to run there.
